mapper.select: SELECT pl.pno, mf.id, bname, gname, pl.postcont, pl.cnt, bg.largeimg, TO_CHAR(pl.postdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') pdate, TO_CHAR(pl.postdate, 'HH:MI:ss') ptime, '#'||LISTAGG(hname, '#') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY hname DESC) hash FROM hashtab h, (SELECT p.pno pno, p.bno, p.mno, postcont, postdate, count(l.pno) cnt FROM poststab p, liketab l WHERE p.pno = l.pno GROUP BY p.pno, postcont, postdate, p.bno, p.mno) pl, (SELECT bno, bname, largeimg, g.genre, gname FROM booktab b, genretab g WHERE b.genre = g.genre) bg, (SELECT DISTINCT mno, id FROM membertab m, fallowtab WHERE m.mno = (SELECT mno FROM membertab WHERE id = 'jinro' ) OR (fallower_no = (SELECT mno FROM membertab WHERE id = 'jinro' ) AND m.mno = fallow_no)) mf WHERE pl.pno = h.pno(+) AND pl.mno = mf.mno AND pl.bno = bg.bno GROUP BY pl.pno, pl.postcont, pl.postdate, pl.cnt, mf.id, bname, gname, bg.largeimg ORDER BY pl.postdate, pl.cnt DESC

SELECT ROWNUM, often.cnt, often.bno, bname, gname FROM (SELECT count(p.bno) cnt, p.bno FROM poststab p, booktab b WHERE p.bno = b.bno AND p.isshow = 'Y' GROUP BY p.bno) often, booktab b, genretab g WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 AND b.bno = often.bno AND b.genre = g.genre ORDER BY cnt DESC
